## Iteration 1

## Insights & Optimizations

### 1. Optimization: Implement global exception handling middleware to capture and log full stack traces and inner exception details, replacing the generic "Unknown issue" fallback with standardized HTTP error responses and unique correlation IDs to ensure root cause observability.
